page.title: 03HOLYWELL LAKE
page.content: I live in Holywell Lake village which is a few miles from Langford Budville. I love living in a village it is very quiet but sometimes it is noisey with lorries and tractors. There are a lot of animals in the fields, mostly cows and sheep and there are lovely views from all of the houses. There are fourteen houses, twenty-two bungalows, fourteen cottages, four council bungalows and houses and one pub. Up the road from the pub there is a house which used to be the village school, it's been converted into a lovely house. The children that went there had to go to other schools. Down the road there is a factory and in one part of the factory they mend cars, in the other part of the factory they make blinds for houses.
